Package gchecky :: Module model :: Class areas_t
[hide private]
[frames] | no frames]

Class areas_t

source code

object --+    
         |    
 gxml.Node --+
             |
            areas_t
Known Subclasses:
allowed_areas_t, excluded_areas_t
Represents a list of regions. 
>>> test_node(
...   areas_t(
...     states = ['LA', 'NY'],
...     country_areas = ['ALL', 'CONTINENTAL_48']
...   )
... ,
... '''
... <node>
... <us-state-area>
...   <state>LA</state>
... </us-state-area>
... <us-state-area>
...   <state>NY</state>
... </us-state-area>
... <us-country-area>
...   <country-area>ALL</country-area>
... </us-country-area>
... <us-country-area>
...   <country-area>CONTINENTAL_48</country-area>
... </us-country-area>
... </node>
... '''
... )
